welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Westview, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Opa Locka Airport primarily serves private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miami International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal at Miami International Airport dedicated to serving domestic and Canadian flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal at Miami International Airport dedicated to serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport offers exclusive services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tamiami Airport is a small and modern facility with a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Tamiami Airport offers exclusive services for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pompano Beach Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
